script: write,写

n.

At the begin of the script directly after the initial block of comment.
放在最初的解释模块后面,script的起始部分.

同时, 楷书 和行书也出现并快速发展起来.
East Palace, West Palace has 3 version, stage play script, film script and fiction.

Specifies a script for the page that is interpreted by a script engine.
指定由脚本引擎解释的页面中的脚本.

隶体是书法从篆体到楷体的过渡.
